title: Nanamica Graphic Tee
overview: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisici elit, sed eiusmod tempor incidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquid ex ea commodi consequat.
description:
Nanamica back for AW13 with a selection of luggage combining traditional outdoor silhouettes with contemporary fabrics and processes, an expertly crafted collection of some of the most innovative clothing and accessories available. The Loopwheel Graphic Tee is a classically styled crew neck tee, constructed from CoolMax fabric which regulates body temperature. Made in Japan, this is no ordinary tee, with a superbly soft handle and featuring high quality prints on the chest and between the shoulders.

  • Cool Max Cotton/Polyester Blend
  • High Quality Screen Print
  • Print Between Shoulders
  • Crew Neck Collar
  • Printed Internal Label Detail
  • Made in Japan

title: Berry and Prosciutto Pizza
flavour: mozzarella topped with Hickory BBQ sauce
overview: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisici elit, sed eiusmod tempor incidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquid ex ea commodi consequat.
description:
• Ham, Cheese & Tomato

    Champagne ham, fresh tomato & mozzarella, topped with oregano

  • Cheesy Garlic Pizza

    Mozzarella on a crème fraîche & garlic base, topped with oregano on a gluten free base

  • Hot Chilli Beef

    Ground beef, red onion, jalapenos & mozzarella topped with buffalo hot sauce & chilli flakes on a gluten free base

  • Americano

    Pepperoni, mushrooms & mozzarella on a gluten free base

  • Peri-Peri Beef

    Ground beef, pepperoni, mushroom, red onion, mozzarella topped with peri peri sauce on a gluten free base

  • Hawaiian

    Champagne Ham, juicy pineapple & mozzarella on a gluten free base

  • The Deluxe

    Pepperoni, ground beef, smoked leg ham, capsicum, red onion & mozzarella with oregano on a gluten free base

  • Pepperoni

    Lots of pepperoni & mozzarella on a gluten free base

  • Champagne Ham & Cheese

    Champagne Ham & mozzarella on a gluten free base

  • Veg Trio

    Baby spinach, mushrooms & fresh tomato with oregano & mozzarella on a gluten free base

  • Margherita

    Cherry tomatoes, fresh tomato, basil drizzle & mozzarella on a gluten free base

  • Simply Cheese

    Lots of mozzarella on a gluten free base

  • Vegorama

    Capsicum, mushroom, baby spinach, red onion, fresh tomato, oregano & mozzarella on a tomato & garlic sauce base, with a gluten free crust

  • Peri-Peri Chicken

    Sliced roast chicken breast, cherry tomatoes, baby spinach, red onion, mozzarella and topped with peri peri sauce on a gluten free base

  • Apricot Chicken

    Seasoned chicken, red onion, capsicum, & mozzarella topped with Apricot sauce on a gluten free base

  • Garlic Prawn

    Prawns, baby spinach, fresh tomato, oregano & mozzarella on a crème fraîche & garlic base, with a gluten free crust

  • Prawn Bacon & Feta

    Prawns, rasher bacon, feta cheese, capsicum, fresh tomato, oregano & chilli flakes on a tomato & garlic sauce base, with a gluten free crust
